languages.text: Вторая ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, Наслаждение убийствами, мгновенно снимает эффект "восстановление дыхания", но может быть использована только после убийства 3 врагов в бою. Ее использование дает солдату ряд {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя: +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, +(5 + 2 × бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g})% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g} и +бонус Ловкости% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} солдата мгновенно {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} его оружие и позволяет ему без затрат ОД совершать дополнительные атаки — те, что при использовании выбранного оружия в обычном случае требуют меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Количество этих атак равно {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} оружия (минимум 2). До конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} солдата каждое первое его попадание в новую цель становится критическим. Важные характеристики солдата: Дальний Бой, Ловкость, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} солдата: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}. Солдаты могут стать архмилитантами, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотниками за головами{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастерами-тактиками{/g}.

The Soldier's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Revel in Slaughter, immediately removes the winded effect, but can only be used once the Soldier has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Soldier a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} until the end of combat: +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, and +Agility bonus% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and allows them to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP. Until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Soldier's first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a critical hit. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Ballistic Skill, Agility, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}. Soldiers can become Arch-Militants, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.
languages.original_text: Вторая ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, Наслаждение убийствами, мгновенно снимает эффект "восстановление дыхания", но может быть использована только после убийства 3 врагов в бою. Ее использование дает солдату ряд {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя: +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, +(5 + 2 × бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g})% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g} и +бонус Ловкости% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} солдата мгновенно {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} его оружие и позволяет ему без затрат ОД совершать дополнительные атаки — те, что при использовании выбранного оружия в обычном случае требуют меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Количество этих атак равно {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} оружия (минимум 2). До конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} солдата каждое первое его попадание в новую цель становится критическим. Важные характеристики солдата: Дальний Бой, Ловкость, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} солдата: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}. Солдаты могут стать архмилитантами, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотниками за головами{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастерами-тактиками{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Marksman's second keystone ability, Revel in Slaughter, can only be used once the Marksman has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Marksman a number of bonuses until the end of combat: +10 Ballistic Skill, +(5 + 2 × AGI bonus)% critical damage, and +AGI bonus% critical hit chance. The Marksman's heroic act instantly restores all their AP, removes the attack limit until the end of their current turn, and allows them to reload their weapon for free until the end of combat. Key characteristics: Ballistic Skill, Agility, Perception, Intelligence. Skills: Awareness, Demolition, Medicae, Athletics. Marksmen can become Veterans, Hunters, or Tacticians.

The Marksman's second keystone ability, Revel in Slaughter, can only be used once the Marksman has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Marksman a number of bonuses until the end of combat: +10 Ballistic Skill, +(5 + 2 × AGI bonus)% critical damage, and +AGI bonus% critical hit chance. The Marksman's heroic act instantly restores all their AP, removes the attack limit until the end of their current turn, and allows them to reload their weapon for free until the end of combat. Key characteristics: Ballistic Skill, Agility, Perception, Intelligence. Skills: Awareness, Demolition, Medicae, Athletics. Marksmen can become Veterans, Hunters, or Tacticians.

The Marksman's second keystone ability, Revel in Slaughter, can only be used once the Marksman has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Marksman a number of bonuses until the end of combat: +10 Ballistic Skill, +(5 + 2 × AGI bonus)% critical damage, and +AGI bonus% critical hit chance. The Marksman's heroic act instantly restores all their AP, removes the attack limit until the end of their current turn, and allows them to reload their weapon for free until the end of combat. Key characteristics: Ballistic Skill, Agility, Perception, Intelligence. Skills: Awareness, Demolition, Medicae, Athletics. Marksmen can become Veterans, Hunters, or Tacticians.

The Soldier's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Revel in Slaughter, immediately removes the winded effect, but can only be used once the Soldier has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Soldier a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} until the end of combat: +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, and +Agility bonus% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and allows them to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP. Until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Soldier's first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a critical hit. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Ballistic Skill, Agility, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}. Soldiers can become Arch-Militants, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

languages.text: Die zweite Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Soldaten, Genüssliches Gemetzel, entfernt den Effekt „Außer Atem“ sofort, kann aber erst eingesetzt werden, wenn der Soldat in diesem Kampf 3 Feinde getötet hat. Nach Einsatz gewährt die Fähigkeit dem Soldaten bis zum Ende des Kampfes diverse {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}: +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-Bonus) % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} und +Beweglichkeit-Bonus % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Soldaten {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}lädt{/g} seine Waffe sofort nach und erlaubt ihm, mit der Waffe, die normalerweise die wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet, eine bestimmte Anzahl Zusatzangriffe zu machen. Diese Anzahl entspricht der {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} seiner Waffe (mindestens 2). Diese Angriffe verbrauchen keine AP. Bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} landet der erste Angriff des Soldaten gegen jeden neuen Feind automatisch einen kritischen Treffer. Schlüssel-{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: Ballistik-Fertigkeit, Beweglichkeit, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Bewusstheit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}. Soldaten können Erzmilitanten, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} werden.
languages.original_text: The Soldier's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Revel in Slaughter, immediately removes the winded effect, but can only be used once the Soldier has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Soldier a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} until the end of combat: +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, and +Agility bonus% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and allows them to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP. Until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Soldier's first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a critical hit. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Ballistic Skill, Agility, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}. Soldiers can become Arch-Militants, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die zweite wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Scharfschützen, Genüssliches Gemetzel, kann erst eingesetzt werden, wenn der Scharfschütze im laufenden Kampf 3 Feinde getötet hat. Nach dem Einsatz gewährt die Fähigkeit dem Scharfschützen bis zum Ende des Kampfes eine Reihe an {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}: +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-Bonus) % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischer Schaden{/g} und +BEW-Bonus % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Scharfschützen stellt sofort alle seine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} wieder her, entfernt das Angriffslimit bis zum Ende seines laufenden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} und erlaubt ihm kostenloses {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Nachladen{/g} seiner Waffe bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Schlüsseleigenschaften: Ballistik-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeit{/g}, Beweglichkeit, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}. Fertigkeiten: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}. Scharfschützen können zu Veteranen, Huntern oder Taktikern werden.

languages.text: La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé du soldat, Massacre Jubilatoire, annule immédiatement l’effet Essoufflement, mais ne peut uniquement être utilisée lorsque le Soldat a tué 3 ennemis pendant cette bataille. Une fois utilisée, cette capacité donne aux soldats les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} suivants jusqu’à la fin du combat : +10 en {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, +(5 + 2 × bonus d’{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}agilité{/g}) % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}, et +bonus d’agilité % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chance d’infliger un coup critique{/g}. L’{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} instantanément son arme et lui permet de faire un nombre d’attaques supplémentaires égal à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de son arme (minimum 2), avec l’attaque de l’arme qui coûte généralement le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Ces attaques ne coûtent aucun PA. Jusqu’à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la première attaque du soldat contre chaque nouvel ennemi inflige automatiquement un coup critique. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : Capacité de tir, Agilité, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences :{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}. Les soldats peuvent devenir archimilitants, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseurs de prime{/g}, ou {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maîtres tacticiens{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Soldier's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Revel in Slaughter, immediately removes the winded effect, but can only be used once the Soldier has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Soldier a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} until the end of combat: +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, and +Agility bonus% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and allows them to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP. Until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Soldier's first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a critical hit. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Ballistic Skill, Agility, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}. Soldiers can become Arch-Militants, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé du Tireur d'Élite, Massacre Jubilatoire, ne peut être utilisée que lorsque ce Tireur d'Élite a éliminé 3 ennemis au cours du combat. Une fois utilisée, cette capacité confère au Tireur d'Élite un certain nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat : +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}, +(5 + 2 × bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g} et +bonus d'AGI % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du Tireur d'Élite restaure instantanément tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, supprime la limite d'attaque jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et lui permet de {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharger{/g} gratuitement son arme jusqu'à la fin du combat. Caractéristiques clés : {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétence{/g} Balistique, Agilité, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. Compétences : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Conscience{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétique{/g}. Les Tireurs d'Élite peuvent devenir Vétérans, Chasseurs ou Tacticiens.

languages.text: 士兵的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：狂欢屠戮可以立刻消除“疲惫”状态，但只能当士兵在本场战斗中杀死3名敌人之后使用。 使用之后，士兵会获得以下{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}+10，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}提高（5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}加值）%，暴击率提高敏捷加值%，效果持续至战斗结束。 士兵的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以立刻{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}武器，让士兵使用行动点数消耗最低的攻击方式额外进行攻击。额外攻击次数等于武器的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}，最少2次，额外攻击不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。士兵的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束之前，每当攻击新的敌人时，首次攻击都必将造成暴击。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：弹道技能、敏捷、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}。 士兵可以晋级为首席战士、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Soldier's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Revel in Slaughter, immediately removes the winded effect, but can only be used once the Soldier has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Soldier a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} until the end of combat: +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, and +Agility bonus% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and allows them to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP. Until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Soldier's first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a critical hit. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Ballistic Skill, Agility, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}. Soldiers can become Arch-Militants, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 神射手的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：狂欢屠戮，只能当神射手在本场战斗中杀死3名敌人之后使用。 使用之后，神射手会获得以下加成效果：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}+10，{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}+（5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}加值）%，暴击率+敏捷加值%，效果持续至战斗结束。{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}{/g} 神射手的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}会立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，当前{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内不受任何攻击次数限制，且{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}不再消耗行动点数，效果持续至战斗结束。 关键属性：弹道技能{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}{/g}、敏捷、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}。 技能：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}。 神射手可以晋级为老兵、猎人或战术专家。

languages.text: La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los soldados, Disfrutar de la matanza, elimina el efecto sin aliento al momento pero solo se puede usar cuando el soldado ha matado a 3 enemigos en la batalla. Una vez empleada, esta capacidad concede al soldado una serie de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} hasta que termine el combate: +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, +(5 + 2 × bonificación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} y +bonificación de Agilidad % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los soldados {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} su arma al instante y les permite lanzar un número de ataques adicionales igual a la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} de su arma (mínimo 2) usando el ataque del arma que menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} cueste. Estos ataques no consumen PA. Hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el primer ataque que el soldado lance contra cada enemigo diferente será un impacto crítico automático. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: Habilidad de proyectiles, Agilidad, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}. Los soldados pueden convertirse en Archimilitantes, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestros tácticos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Soldier's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Revel in Slaughter, immediately removes the winded effect, but can only be used once the Soldier has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Soldier a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} until the end of combat: +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, and +Agility bonus% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and allows them to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP. Until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Soldier's first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a critical hit. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Ballistic Skill, Agility, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}. Soldiers can become Arch-Militants, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los tiradores de élite, Disfrutar de la matanza, solo puede utilizarse cuando el tirador de élite en cuestión haya abatido a 3 enemigos en la batalla. Una vez empleada, esta habilidad concede al tirador de élite una serie de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} hasta que termine el combate: +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, +(5 + 2 × bonificación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}daño de impacto crítico{/g} y +bonificación de AGI % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los tiradores de élite restaura inmediatamente todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, elimina el límite de ataque hasta que finalice su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} actual y les permite {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recargar{/g} su arma sin coste hasta que termine el combate. Características relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidad{/g} de proyectiles, Agilidad, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}. Habilidades: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}. Los tiradores de élite pueden convertirse en veteranos, cazadores o tácticos.

languages.original_text: The second key ability, Pleasure Kills, can only be used after killing 3 enemies in combat. This ability gives the shooter a number of bonuses to his stats for the rest of the fight: +10 to Ranged, +(5 + 2 × LOB bonus)% to Critical Damage, and +BonusLOB% to Critical Hit Chance. The archer's Heroic Act instantly restores all his OD, removes the limit on the number of attacks he can make that turn, and makes his cooldown free for the rest of the battle. Important Rifleman Traits: Ranged Combat, Dexterity, Perception, Intelligence. ShooterSkills: Observation, Explosive Engineering, Medicine, Athleticism. Shooters can become veterans, hunters or tacticians.

languages.text: 兵士の二番目に重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は殺戮の歓喜であり、即座に「息切れ」状態を解除するものの、戦闘中に兵士が敵を3体倒した後にのみ使用可能。 このアビリティを使用すると、兵士はいくつかの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得しこれは戦闘終了時まで継続する：10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、+(5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}ボーナス)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}、および+敏捷ボーナス%クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット率{/g}。 兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}は即座に武器を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}し、その武器の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}に等しい数の追加攻撃（最小2）が行えるようになる。通常、最も消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の少ない武器を使用する。これらの攻撃はAPを消費しない。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、新しい敵への兵士の最初の攻撃は自動的にクリティカルヒットになる。 主要{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}：射撃技能、敏捷、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}解体{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}。 兵士はアーク・ミリタント、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦術の達人{/g}になることができる。
languages.original_text: The Soldier's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Revel in Slaughter, immediately removes the winded effect, but can only be used once the Soldier has killed 3 enemies this battle. Once used, the ability grants the Soldier a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} until the end of combat: +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, and +Agility bonus% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and allows them to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP. Until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Soldier's first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a critical hit. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Ballistic Skill, Agility, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}. Soldiers can become Arch-Militants, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: マークスマンの二番目に重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は殺戮の歓喜であり、これは戦闘中にマークスマンが敵を3体倒した後にのみ使用可能。 このアビリティを使用すると、マークスマンは複数の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得することができ、獲得したボーナスは戦闘終了時まで継続する：10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}、+(5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}ボーナス)%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルダメージ{/g}、および+AGIボーナス%クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}。 マークスマンの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}では即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を回復し、現在の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで攻撃の制限を解除することができる。また戦闘終了時まで自由に武器を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}することが可能となる。 主要能力：弾道{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}、敏捷性、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}。 スキル：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}デモリション{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}。 マークスマンは古参、ハンター、あるいは戦略家になることができる。
